protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-3961
protocol.text: Signal values were derived from Affymetrix *.cel files using a modified version of the robust multiple array normalisation (GCRMA, [Wu, 2003]).

protocol.name: P-MTAB-3962
text: Total RNA was prepared from frozen tissue using Trizol and purified with RNeasy columns (Quiagen, Hilden, Germany).

protocol.name: P-MTAB-3963
text: Seeds were plated on sterile MS medium containing 1% agar. After stratification for 48h at 4°C, plates were incubated in Weiss growth chambers (Weiss, Switzerland). Growth conditions were 16 h photoperiod, 23°C and white light of 70 umol/m2s. Twelve days after induction of germination, 4 h after dawn, complete seedlings were harvested into liquid nitrogen. The entire experiment was performed twice providing independent biological replicates.
(Parameters: start time = 12, time unit = days, min temperature = 23, temperature unit = C, media = MS medium containing 1% agar)
